welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Placilla de Penuelas, a charming city nestled in the heart of Chile. Known for its stunning natural landscapes and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vina del Mar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Vina del Mar Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Valparaiso Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Valparaiso Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
